stories.text:
I was surfing around and I came across few paid newsletters about software development/leadership and so on. I am wonder what HN members do when it comes to keeping up to date (other than checking HN). 
Do you have any subscription to any newsletter that you receive and you read to keep up to date or to just refresh and reinforce your knowledge and understanding? If yes, could you mention the newsletter you are following.
stories.title: Ask HN: What newsletter are you receiving that you are reading?
The ‘coasting’ workers who’ve checked out of their jobs
Russia has killed civilians in Ukraine. Kyiv’s defense tactics add to the danger

stories.text:
Yesterday I sat with my 3 year old in front of the computer to watch a kids show. We've avoided having our child watch "tv" as long as we could, but... it does come in handy.

I've been bothered however by the fast paced editing, and lack of pedagogical input most of them have.

Would love to hear what the parents in this community think.

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: What shows would you recommend for toddlers?
